Description:
Big Block with a Big Family Home
CLOSING DATE SALE
Tuesday 30th July, 2019 by 5.00 pm.
(Unless sold prior)
This magnificent large family home is positioned perfectly in one of Croydon's most picturesque streets and will provide a wonderful oasis and plenty of space for the whole family to spread out and enjoy.
On a usable block that is over a 1/3 of an acre in size at 1532m2 the home offers you a family friendly floor plan that consists of 4 good sized robed bedrooms, the main at the front has a full ensuite and walk in robe.
There are no less than 5 living areas to choose from, starting with the large lounge room at the front then through to the dining room for all your formal occasions such as Christmas lunch or birthday dinners. The family meals area adjacent to the kitchen is the real hub of the home for all your everyday living and dinning needs and is complimented with a crackling open fire place for those cosy winter nights.
The upstairs rumpus room off the family meals area and also adjacent to the kitchen will be the ideal space for the kids play room and easy for Mum and Dad to keep a close eye on the kids as they laugh and play.
Downstairs is an AWESOME space for a man cave/she den, pool room, theatre room, workshop/studio or a work from home office as you have outside access to the front.
Heading back upstairs you will find the centrally located and well equipped kitchen, which has stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, loads of bench and cupboard space, plus a massive walk in pantry that will ensure the chef of the family is a master chef for any meal occasion.
Before we move outside, we mustn't forget other internal features which include gas ducted heating, open fire place, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, main bathroom with separate toilet, laundry room, heaps of storage cupboards plus light filled interiors with neutral colours and tones.
Moving out from the family room you will find a spacious undercover deck that will be the ideal space for family gatherings, parties, casual BBQ's, alfresco dining, cool afternoon drinks or leisurely weekend breakfasts with a coffee and the paper.
The large grassed backyard will be a haven for the children and pets to play safely all year round.
The gardens are well established with flowering trees, natives and fruit trees.
Car accommodation is well taken care of in the large double garage with a workshop at the rear plus a double carport that is all accessed on the large concrete drive way behind secure double gates.
All this is with walking distance to Croydon central for shopping, cafes, restaurants, Coles and Aldi supermarkets, public transport, respected schools and all other amenities you may need.
If you're looking for a BIG family home on a BIG block, be quick and book your viewing today.

Sale by SET DATE: Tues 30th July at 6pm (unless sold prior)
This swoon-worthy property promises to delight the senses with its unrivalled comfort and convenience spread across a spacious single-level floorplan, affording the ultimate in modern living.
From the striking partially rendered exterior to the sophisticated interiors, everything about this home has been designed to impress. Enter into a fresh and inviting residence where an immediate feeling of spaciousness and awe stands as a testimony to superbly executed contemporary design principles.
A combination of high ceilings (2.7m approx.), a crisp white palette and beautiful hardwood floors create a warm and inviting ambience, further complemented by abundant windows to envelope the interior with natural lightjust one of many thoughtful design elements found throughout the residence.
The free-flowing floorplan places the comfortable lounge at the front of the home, an enjoyable space showcasing an impacting design to enhance relaxation with friends and family. The open-plan family/meals area seamlessly connects the rear deck through double glass sliding doors, extending the available living space a boon when hosting larger events.
The inspiring kitchen gives a nod to the latest in contemporary design, melding form and function together to create a dramatic and stylish result. The inclusion of contrasting tones and pendant lighting dropping warmth over the island bench are a standout feature, while practical benefits include; electric oven, gas stove, dishwasher, tiled backsplash and breakfast bar.
The layout caters for the retiree as much as it does the family or executive couple. The master conveniently comprises a fitted walk-in robe, split system air-conditioning and full spacious ensuite boasting a rain shower and large vanity. The additional two well-proportioned bedrooms are positioned away from the master for privacy and feature double built-in robes, split system air-conditioning and easy access to the main bathroom incorporating a bath, shower and separate toilet.
This beautiful home is fully loaded with extras that will please even the most discerning buyer, including, separate laundry with cupboard, ducted heating/refrigerative cooling, ducted vacuum, split system air-conditioning and built-in speakers in family area, double linen and storage cupboards, new carpet, Roman blinds, push-button light switches, security cameras and alarm, meticulous front landscaping, in addition to a secure courtyard with shed. The remote double garage adjoins a sizable studio showcasing timber flooringperfect for a home office/business, gym, workshop, man cave or games room for the kids.
With only three homes on the block, this property is positioned just a short walk from Kilsyth Shopping Centre, Kurrajong Reserve and Ruskin Park Primary School, as well as being only a brief drive from Croydon Railway Station, Kilsyth Centenary Swimming Centre, Brentwood Park Kindergarten, St. Peter Julian Eymard Primary School, Yarra Hills Secondary College, BMX tracks, libraries, EastLink freeway and Croydon Central.
This brilliant, easy-care home facilitates a private, secure and comfortable lifestyle.
